subs.text: This moment is probably the last chance before the November election in the US to get back on the right course, not just in the US but around the world, esp Europe.
They must feel what we feel here, that if we don't do this right, we will have a Putin type government in the US in 2024. That will, it seems, be the last straw for democracy worldwide.
Putin has managed to get us all on the same side more or less. He played his big card too soon. Should have waited until this time next year.

We've been to moments of unity like this before in recent history -- 9/11 and then Jan 6. Both times we wasted the unity and clarity. On Jan 7 American Republicans said "enough" but shortly thereafter they were back behind Putin's lapdog, Trump.

This is a very serious moment for all of us. And at the same time, so refreshing to see the human spirit so clear among Ukranians. They outspoken and clear of purpose. They are a shining example of what we can be if we stop feeling sorry for ourselves and get to work.
